name: Galactic Conquest Saved Game
summary: Saved game file created by Galactic Conquest, an outer-space strategy game included with Star Wars Battlefront 2; contains game information, such as the state of planets, airship fleets, and currencies; can be used to save progress for the Empire, Republic, CIS, or Rebellion factions.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

ios.display_name: Pandemic Studios Star Wars Battlefront II
